commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Bas7b151ad"

diff:
"7b151ad #62777 r=mkaply, a=blizzard 1255 and 1256 are not supported on OS/2 - use 862 and 864 instead
diff --git a/widget/src/os2/nsGfxDefs.h b/widget/src/os2/nsGfxDefs.h
index a0493b0..3198021 100644
--- a/widget/src/os2/nsGfxDefs.h
+++ b/widget/src/os2/nsGfxDefs.h
@@ -87,8 +87,8 @@ static nsUconvInfo gUconvInfo[15  /* eCharSet_COUNT from nsFontMetricsOS2.cpp */
   { "RUSSIAN",     1251, NULL },
   { "GREEK",       1253, NULL },
   { "TURKISH",     1254, NULL },
-  { "HEBREW",      1255, NULL },
-  { "ARABIC",      1256, NULL },
+  { "HEBREW",      862,  NULL },
+  { "ARABIC",      864,  NULL },
   { "BALTIC",      1257, NULL },
   { "THAI",        874,  NULL },
   { "SHIFTJIS",    932,  NULL },
"
